local_intent: Lift the grasped lid vertically by 0.2 m while ensuring the grasp remains stable.
assumptions: Lid edge is already grasped after Pick.
Maintaining grasp stability during the lift suffices as verification.
coherence_with_global: Executes the MoveDelta(z, 0.2, 1200) transfer step that follows Pick and precedes OpenContainer, with pre/post grasp checks aligned to the global plan.
